channel.title: OpenOffice.org: Mac OS X Port: News
channel.description: News about the Mac OS X port of OpenOffice.org

item.title: DEV300_m2 Aqua Development Snapshot Released
item.description: The Mac Porting team of OpenOffice.org announces a new development build, which includes lots of new improvements since the last build.

item.title: 5 issues before the Barcelona Development Snapshot
item.description: The Mac Porting team of OpenOffice.org announces that it will release a new development snapshot at the OpenOffice.org conference 2007 in Barcelona. 5 issues need to be fixed before the snapshot is released.

item.title: Second Aqua Development Snapshot Released
item.description: You can now download a new Snapshot of OpenOffice.org Aqua for Mac OS X

item.title: First Aqua Development Snapshot Released
item.description: You can now download a Snapshot of OpenOffice.org Aqua for Mac OS X

item.title: Sun Officially Supports the OpenOffice.org Mac Port
item.description: Sun now has 2 Software Engineers working on the Mac Port of OpenOffice.org

item.title: OpenOffice.org Mac Porting team updates timeline
item.description: The OpenOffice.org Mac Porting Team aims to release an Alpha OpenOffice.org Aqua in May 2007, and have a beta OpenOffice.org Aqua by the end of 2007
